text: sillo haneulgwa daejie issneun mo deun geos-i hananim-ui gwonneung-an-e issna ni geubunkkeseoneun neohuiui sangtaeleul al go gyesinila geulihayeo geudeul-i geu bunkkelo sohwandoeeo ganeun nal geubunkke seoneun geudeul-i haenghayeossdeon modeun sasil-eulgeudeul-ege allyeo jusilini sillo hananim-eun modeun geos-eul algo gyesinila
